comments.body: A `keylog` event was also added to `TLSSocket` but with only `line: Buffer` as argument.

I think `requestCert` is only applicable to `TLSSocket` and `createServer` but not to `connect` therefore it should be not part of `CommonConnectionOptions`.
There are also other options here where I'm not sure if they are correct like `NPNProtocols` which is not in docs but maybe it's best to update this via a separate PR.

I went through the code and made sure `requestCert` is passed through.
Also NPNProtocols was kinda weird, there are some referenced to it in https://github.com/nodejs/node/search?q=NPNProtocols&unscoped_q=NPNProtocols but it appears to have been removed here: https://github.com/nodejs/node/pull/19403 so I will probably remove it.

The reason I extracted those options is due to wanting to avoid even more duplication.
